properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:43AM CST until January 13 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Illinois...

Vermilion River at Pontiac affecting Livingston County
Vermilion River near Leonore affecting La Salle County

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 24-48 hours into the future. This forecasts
is now based mostly upon observed precipitation.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Vermilion River at Pontiac, or from Near Pontiac downstream to
IL-23 near Streator.
* from Sunday morning to Monday evening.
* At  745 AM Saturday the stage was 6.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Sunday morning and continue to
rise to near 15.0 feet by Sunday evening.
* Impact...At 15.0 feet...Low-lying residences threatened between Mill
Street and Chautauqua Park in Pontiac. IL-116 threatened east and
west of Pontiac.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.
